The position
For the new Amsterdam Metro project we are looking for an experienced Testing Engineer with a hands-on approach to carry out the necessary tests of the equipment in the metro, such as the electronic and electrical control systems and pneumatic-mechanical equipment. In addition, the Testing Engineer coordinates the work of the local technician and facilitates the communication with the customer. The Testing Engineer is able to explain the working of technical systems to non-technicians. The Testing Engineer will report to the Testing Manager who is located in Spain.
The Testing Engineer has good communication skills and can work independently. He or she can read electrical design specifications and technical drawings and has experience in making technical reports and manuals. The Testing Engineer is versatile, creative and has excellent analytical skills. In addition, he or she is flexible, available to travel and willing to work in various shifts, both during the week and weekends.
The ideal start date for our Testing Engineer is 15 March 2021. Provided the Corona measures allow: the training will be in Spain at 2 different locations (Irun and Corella). The expected time in Spain is about 3 to 4 months, depending on the start date. During the summer it is expected that you will move back to the Netherlands to continue the test works in Diemen.
The candidate
Has an engineering degree in either Electrics, Electronics or Telecommunication;Preferably has experience with the commissioning of electrical, electronic, pneumatic and mechanical systems in a start-up environment;Is stress resistant and able to work under pressure;Is organized, detailed, efficient and assertive;Is eager to learn and are challenged by solving technical issues;Experiences in the railways, maritime or aviation sector will be considered a plus;Has excellent communication skills and is fluent in English. Knowledge of Spanish or Dutch would be an advantage.
Compensation & Benefits
CAF Netherlands offers a competitive salary with 40 holidays per annum (of which 13 roster free days) based on a 40 hour work week, travel allowance and a pension plan. An extra net allowance will be provided for the months working abroad.
About CAF
CAF Netherlands was established in 2017 with an office in Utrecht. Our current activities in the Netherlands take place in Nieuwegein, Amsterdam, Diemen, Leidschendam and Utrecht. In Spain, CAF is manufacturing 206 new Sprinters for the NS, 54 new trams for the Provence of Utrecht, 72 new trams for the city of Amsterdam and 30 new metro's for the city of Amsterdam.
CAF truly believes in a more sustainable world and is firmly committed to contribute working towards offering new, more efficient and eco-friendly forms of transport. CAF is one of the international market leaders in the design, manufacture and maintenance of modern rolling stock. CAF is a Spanish company with approximately 13000 employees worldwide who work on about 100 projects spread out over 40 countries. For more information about the company, check our website (http://www.caf.net/).

Job Title: PhD-student: Nonlinear nanophotonic metasurfaces and materials for metrology
Job Description:
As a PhD student, you will develop the optics of nonlinear metasurfaces for wafer metrology. You will build an instrument to generate and measure nonlinear optical signals from nanostructured dielectric resonant metasurfaces, and establish the utility for advanced metrology tools for future semiconductor technology.

The tremendous success of the semiconductor industry has become possible due to highly advanced optical nanolithography to define smaller and smaller nanostructures, hand in hand with quick and accurate optical metrology that guarantees that very tight tolerances are reached in terms of dimensions and in terms of relative alignment of consecutive device layers. For instance, a powerful current day wafer metrology technique measures diffraction patterns of dedicated nanostructured targets that are printed on wafers, and retrieves fine positional and dimensional information from diffraction pattern features.

In this work you will explore nonlinear metasurfaces. Metasurfaces are thin nanostructured layers with engineered resonances in their constituent dielectric or metallic nanoparticles to control amplitude and phase of transmitted and reflected wavefronts. At the state of the art, metasurfaces can encode complex holograms in their geometry. Nonlinear metasurfaces have also been recently reported that frequency-convert incident light, for instance by second harmonic generation. Such frequency-converting metasurfaces have recently led to nonlinear holograms, indicating that the response of nonlinear metasurfaces can be tailored by geometry through optical interferences and engineering of near-field resonances and hot spots. You will work on metasurface designs and build a nonlinear Fourier microscope to answer the question how such nonlinear metasurface holograms can be used to retrieve metrologically relevant information about nanoscale geometries. The ultimate limits in this project will be to explore even atomically thin materials and geometries as the ultimate frontier of nanoelectronics, and to push the nonlinear emission from materials into the extreme ultraviolet range for achieving ultimate resolution and accuracy in metrology applications.
About the group
You will perform this project in the research group Resonant Nanophotonics at AMOLF and the team of Peter Kraus at ARCNL. The research will be done in close collaboration with ASML, and targets both academic and applied breakthroughs.

About the group and institute
This is a collaborative project between the Resonant Nanophotonics group at AMOLF, headed by Prof. Dr. Femius Koenderink and the Metrology Department at ARCNL, in particular with Dr. Peter Kraus and Prof. Dr. Arie den Boef. The research activities in the Resonant Nanophotonics group at AMOLF aim at developing nanoscale photonic structures, such as plasmonics and metasurfaces, to control scattering, emission, amplification and detection of light. The group spans the entire research cycle from developing advanced nanophotonics concepts using state of the art theory and numerical design, to nanofabrication of designed structures in the Amsterdam NanoLab cleanroom at AMOLF, and the development of state of the art optical scatterometry and microscopy methods. The ARCNL team is expert in nonlinear optics and high-harmonic generation, computational imaging and metrology. For this project, your lab work will be primarily stationed at AMOLF, as employee of the AMOLF-ARCNL joint research programme, you will work closely with the ARCNL team, as well as with expert industrial contacts from ASML.
 AMOLF performs leading research on the fundamental physics and design principles of natural and man-made complex matter, with research in 4 interconnected themes: nanophotonics, nanophotovoltaics, designer matter, and biophysics. AMOLF leverages these insights to create novel functional materials, and to find solutions to societal challenges in renewable energy, green ICT, and health care. AMOLF is one of the NWO-I national research institutes located at the Amsterdam Science Park, Amsterdam, The Netherlands. It has approximately 130 scientist and a total size of ca. 200 employees. Furthermore it hosts the Amsterdam NanolabNL clean room, which is part of the national NanoLabNL cleanroom network. See also www.amolf.nl

ARCNL The Advanced Research Center for Nanolithography (ARCNL) focuses on the fundamental physics and chemistry involved in current and future key technologies in nanolithography, primarily for the semiconductor industry. ARCNL is a public-private partnership between the Dutch Research Council (NWO), the University of Amsterdam (UvA), the VU University Amsterdam (VU) and the semiconductor equipment manufacturer ASML. ARCNL is located at the Amsterdam Science Park, Amsterdam, The Netherlands, and is currently building up towards a size of approximately 100 scientists and support staff. See also www.arcnl.nl
Qualifications
We are looking for an enthusiastic candidate with an MSc or equivalent degree in physics or a strongly related field. A background in optics, nanophotonics, (coherent) imaging and/or ultrafast laser physics is a clear advantage. Affinity for performing optical experiments, solve mathematical problems and working as part of a team are considered important. Candidates should have experimental skills and be able to communicate in English. The project’s results will be presented at national and international conferences and in relevant journals. The successful candidate is expected to write a PhD thesis towards the end of the 4-year project, which will be defended at the University of Amsterdam. You will need to meet the requirements for an MSc-degree, to ensure eligibility for a Dutch PhD examination.
Terms of employment
The position is intended as full-time (40 hours / week, 12 months / year) appointment in the service of the Netherlands Foundation of Scientific Research Institutes (NWO-I) for the duration of four years, with a starting salary of € 2407 and a range of employment benefits. After successful completion of the PhD research a PhD degree will be granted at the University of Amsterdam. Several courses are offered, specially developed for PhD-students. AMOLF assists any new foreign PhD-student with housing and visa applications and compensates their transport costs and furnishing expenses.

Contact info
Prof.dr. A.F. Koenderink
Group leader Resonant Nanophotonics
E-mail: f.koenderink@amolf.nl

Phone: +31 (0)20-754 7100

Job Title: PhD | Marie Skłodowska-Curie ITN Fellowship ‘Evidence-based co-creation with youth’

Job Description:
Ben je toe aan een volgende stap binnen de arbeidsbemiddeling? Wil jij de betrouwbare partner zijn voor klanten binnen de beveiligings- en securitybranche? Solliciteer nu op Intercedent bij Consolid, de detacheerder binnen Vervoer & Veiligheid!
Wat ga je doen?
Je hebt een belangrijke key-positie voor je klanten, je flexkrachten maar ook binnen Consolid. Je bent werkzaam in een team van 20 collega’s behorende tot Area Midden-West. Binnen dit team ben jij degene die bezig is met activiteiten binnen de beveiligings-/securitybranche, waarbij andere collega’s de focus leggen op de overige specialismes waar Consolid actief in is, zoals de sectoren Personenvervoer en Transport & Logistiek.


Vacatures in behandeling nemen, recruitment werkzaamheden, klant- en flexkrachtbeheer, genereren van new business en het in gang zetten van nieuwe initiatieven, daar ga jij je voornamelijk mee bezig houden. Om dit goed te stroomlijnen werk je binnen de organisatie nauw samen met je team, afdeling planning, administratie en onze sales-/accountmanagers.

Binnen jouw eigen flexpoule komen functies voor als Beveiliger, Mobiele Surveillant, BOA en Verkeersregelaar. Ons streven is om hier nieuwe functies aan toe te voegen. Onze Planners zorgen ervoor dat flexkrachten op diensten ingezet worden.

Al met al: een veelzijdige functie met een eigen portefeuille waarbij veel zelfstandigheid wordt gevraagd, maar ook het belang van goede samenwerkingen belangrijk zijn. Een interessante job wanneer je toe bent aan een volgende stap in je carrière!

Wat bieden wij?
Een fulltime dienstverband (40-urige werkweek)
Bij indiensttreding een uitgebreid onboardingsprogramma
Trainingen op gebied van recruitment, sales, relatiebeheer en arbeidsrecht
We komen graag (digitaal) samen d.m.v. vestigingsborrels, vrijmibo's en feestjes
Binnen 2 jaar groei je door naar een seniorrol en krijg jij jaarlijks een eigen opleidingsbudget

In het oog springende arbeidsvoorwaarden:
Een maandsalaris tussen de €2100,- en €3000,- bruto (bij fulltime)
Maar liefst 38 vakantiedagen (bij fulltime) + een bonusregeling (max 10%)
Reiskostenvergoeding, beschikking over een laptop en werktelefoon

Wat zoeken we?
HBO werk- en denkniveau
Je bent toe aan de volgende stap in je carrière
Ervaring in de arbeidsbemiddeling is zeer welkom
Een goede neus voor talenten in de beveiligings-/securitybranche
Je wil leren, het jezelf graag eigen maken en een key-positie vervullen

Job Title: Senior Business Consultant (Risk Management) Value Proposition
Job Description:
Do you see the importance of high quality data? Are you driven to properly define the data needs of Risk Management and deliver it together with various business parties within ABN AMRO? Do you, like us, have the ambition to structurally bring risk data management to a higher level? And do you have good ideas about how this can best be done? Then Senior Business Consultant is definitely an interesting position for you!

In this role you can develop yourself in a professional as well as a personal way. Tell us your story. We are curious!

Your job
The Senior Business Consultant is the link between the agile delivery teams and the stakeholders in the field of data, process and risk management related issues. You deal with complex, especially larger strategic initiatives, form your own opinion and seek alignment with other stakeholders in Risk, Finance, Architecture and IT. In addition, you also have an advisory role towards various (Risk) Management Teams.

You are the first point of contact of the Risk Data & Modelling department for regulatory change or larger internal initiatives. You make sure that they land well and on time at the delivery teams. You supervise this process. That is where your added value lies. You challenge, improve or clarify the desired change. You act as a risk data point of contact in the change process and you step in if the (data) quality is under pressure. Your field of work lies exactly between Risk Management and Data Management and you work closely together with experts in each of these areas.

As Senior Business Consultant in the field of risk data management you are familiar with BCBS239 and Data Management best practices (e.g. DAMA DMBOK). But your work involves more than just translating these policies. Your added value is certainly also in the guidance and advice on its practical feasibility. You do this by advising, guiding and supporting data users in making better use of data. But also by supporting delivery teams in drawing up data requirements and data quality requirements. You will contribute to the transition from a report driven to a data driven organization.

Examples of the work and deliveries of a Senior Business Consultant include:
Drafting the (data) architecture and design for an integrated finance & risk data environment.
Monitor that the delivery teams implement in line with the agreed architecture
Advice and support to the delivery teams on design issues
An impact analysis of new regulatory or internal initiatives;
Maintaining the finance & risk common language;
Point of contact for Risk Management regarding data for business initiatives with a risk component, such as Collateral Lifecycle Management.
Your working environment
You will work in the Value Proposition Team (VPT). This team is part of the Risk Data & Modelling (RD&M) grid. RD&M is part of the Risk Data & Analytics (RD&A) department which falls under Risk Management. The RD&M grid consists of approximately one hundred colleagues who share a passion for getting the most out of risk data. We do this by improving the risk data, the data systems and the data processes.

The Value Proposition Team is the link between the agile delivery teams and the stakeholders and is responsible for developing, guiding and advising on complex, strategic initiatives in the field of risk management, data and process related issues.

The Value Proposition Team (VPT) consists of four colleagues with various backgrounds in risk management, data management, business architecture and process & portfolio management. The team is driven to bring risk data management to a structurally higher level in an international and dynamic environment.

Your profile
The Senior Business Consultant we are looking for has earned her/his spurs in the areas of risk management, data analytics, data management, data modeling, data architecture and/or portfolio management within a banking or financial organization or within consultancy in these areas.

You are an energetic person with a passion for the combination of thinking and doing. You know what's going on within the organization. Customer perspective is your primary drive to work within the team. You take your responsibility. Not only do you have a strong drive to continuously maintain your own expertise, but you also want to actively contribute to the further development and innovation of the field. In addition, you get energy from transferring your expertise to others and are interested in what you can learn from your colleagues with other areas of expertise.

Do you think you fit in with us? Check your profile:
You have a completed HBO or WO education.
At least 5 years of relevant work experience in the field of data, modelling and risk management;
You have (demonstrable) affinity with IT;
Focused on collaboration, innovation and achieving goals;
You embrace the agile way of working;
Data driven and innovative;
You have the skills to challenge your stakeholders and identify the "question behind the question".

Keywords that you like to see reflected in your work are: data governance, data flows, data process, change management, risk model management (run & development), BCBS239, chain thinking, consultancy skills, flexibility, presentation, down-to-earth, constructive, healthy critical, bank-wide thinking, independent and team player.

What we offer
You get the space to contribute to the value creation from our risk data. We like to learn from your experiences with data value creation and applications of models. You will have the opportunity to deepen your expertise and/or develop yourself in the breadth of the function: from data modeling to datadelivery and from portfolio to data management. There are plenty of career opportunities. This mainly depends on your ambitions and interests.
In addition, we offer:
The ability to work flexibly;
An additional benefit budget of 11%, with which you can buy flexible terms of employment (including vacations, contribution to phone, bike or electric bike and additional salary);
A personal development budget of € 1,000 per year to save up to € 3,000;
A public transport annual subscription;
A good pension scheme;
A good salary.

At ABN AMRO we put our knowledge, skills and network to work for customers. So that they can achieve their goals based on responsible decisions. In the Netherlands and abroad. The customer's interests always come first. We want our customers to understand our products and sometimes sell 'no' when the risk of a product is too great for a customer. The customer's interest is also: communicating clearly and coming up with smart solutions that really make a difference. That is our goal.

Interested?
Are you interested? Then respond to this vacancy now. For more information please contact Henri ter Riet via email: henri.ter.riet@nl.abnamro.com.

We would like to get to know you!
- Acquisition by recruitment and selection agencies in response to this vacancy is not appreciated. -

Je start met een sportieve introductieweek om je klas te leren kennen (bekijk hier de vlog van docent Casper over de introductieweek). Daarna ga je aan de bak, om in 2 jaar een landelijk erkend vakdiploma te behalen.
Theorie direct toepassen in de praktijk. Je krijgt o.a. les in:
Logistieke processen: jij leert hoe je de juiste opslag, belading en uitgifte van goederen kunt waarborgen voor zowel levering naar fabrieken op ons terrein als naar klanten over de hele wereld
Bedienen van grote kranen en heftrucks: jij leert hoe je op een veilige manier wagons, vrachtwagens en schepen kunt laden en lossen. Rollen staal van 20 ton te verplaatsen: een hele klus!
Efficiënt werken: jij leert hoe transporten veilig, op tijd én in perfecte conditie kunnen worden afgeleverd. Dit gaat om miljoenen tonnen hoogwaardig staal dus een hele verantwoordelijkheid!
Veilig werken: zodat jij en je collega’s na het werk weer gezond naar huis gaan
Jouw carrière bij Tata Steel
Natuurlijk wil je méér na je opleiding! Blijven leren en jezelf blijven ontwikkelen bij Tata Steel. Zo kun je doorgroeien naar bijvoorbeeld ladingcoördinator of beheerder voertuigen. Check deze video om te kijken wat je na het behalen van jouw diploma bij Tata Steel allemaal kunt doen.
Herken jij jezelf hierin?
Minimaal een VMBO-kaderdiploma of een HAVO 3-4 overgangsbewijs met een voldoende voor wiskunde, of een MBO-2 diploma
Alert onder alle weersomstandigheden en geen last van hoogtevrees
Fit en sportief
18 jaar (of ouder) op het moment dat de opleiding start en (bij voorkeur) in het bezit van een rijbewijs B
Zelfstandig, flexibel, een teamspeler én je kan tegen een stootje
Wat bieden wij jou?
Een leer-/werkovereenkomst (volledig betaalde opleiding mét salaris)
Een landelijk erkend vakdiploma MBO-3 teamleider logistiek
Gegarandeerd een baan én doorgroeimogelijkheden
Een omgeving waar we 24/7 het beste staal maken en steeds nieuwe staalsoorten ontwikkelen
Werken bij één van de schoonste staalbedrijven ter wereld
Een goede sfeer in en buiten de klas: nieuwe vrienden gegarandeerd!
Een bedrijfsschool die is uitgeroepen tot best gewaardeerde MBO-opleiding
Voor veel woonplaatsen bieden we gratis busvervoer van en naar Tata Steel
Wat is jouw werkomgeving?
Het bedienen van grote transportmiddelen zoals enorme heftrucks, hal- en havenkranen
Een fabrieksterrein van 1.500 voetbalvelden groot
Afwisselende werkzaamheden en werkplekken: in de havens werk je lekker in de buitenlucht, weer of geen weer, en in de verzendhallen krijg je vooral te maken met rail- en vrachtvervoer

Over de functie
Als rijder op het platform werk jij nauw samen met leuke collega’s op het platform bij de vliegtuigen. Aan de hand van een planning transporteer je de opgebouwde vracht tussen de loods en de vliegtuigen. Van te voren controleer je uiteraard of alles aanwezig is en of er eventuele beschadigingen zijn. Alles netjes afgelost? Top! Je registreert de tijden, locaties en bijzonderheden van je uitgevoerde transport. Nu ben je weer klaar voor je volgende vracht.
Over het bedrijf
Het bedrijf waar jij aan de slag gaat is met een netwerk van circa 200 locaties in meer dan 20 landen, een van de wereldspelers op het gebied van de passage- en luchtvrachtafhandeling, grondafhandelingsdiensten en technical services. Ze staan voor kwaliteit, nauwkeurigheid en de prettige sfeer op de werkvloer.

Ervaring als platform rijder
Vmbo werk en denkniveau
Ervaring met het rijden van transportmaterieel / cargo

Je bent bereid om drieploegendiensten te werken
